effects.effect: The target can spend a Recovery.

For each piety spent, choose one of the following enhancements: - You can target one additional ally within distance. - You can end one effect on a target that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn. - A prone target can stand up. - A target can spend 1 additional Recovery.
